visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data for a year. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability. The x-axis represents the months of the year, while the y-axis represents the rainfall in millimeters. The data series includes monthly rainfall data for a year, with a custom color applied to the series. Additional configurations include chart margins, background color, and legend settings to ensure a visually appealing and informative chart. The tooltip is also configured with a light background and styled text to provide clear and concise information when hovering over data points.
